item.description:
Explore the Buddha's teaching for lay people and the path of Shin Buddhism for the 21st century. What is its meaning and goal? How do we practice? What is the role of meditation? How can we set up a daily practice?  Senpai ofers practical advice to reansform your life. Presented by Senpai Sensei.

Also, on this date, it will be Shunki Higan-e - Spring Equinox. Higan means "other shore" in Japanese and it points to enlightenment and nirvana or the Pure Land.  Higan-e is a rededication to practice, and highlights the Way of the Bodhisattva with a sense of gratitude for the grace of Other Power.


Visit our main website  at www.bffct.net for Calendar and more information on our beliefs and practices.

 

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
